/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/my-recognition.dir/my-recognition.cpp.o  -o my-recognition -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /usr/local/lib/libjetson-inference.so /usr/local/lib/libjetson-utils.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt -lGL -lGLU -lGLEW -lgstreamer-1.0 -lgstapp-1.0 -lgstpbutils-1.0 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppicc.so -lnvinfer -lnvinfer_plugin -lnvcaffe_parser -lnvonnxparser
